bibl.title: Three Hellenistic Rulers at the Getty.
bibl.note: 1. Inv. 76.AA.72. Ruler head with "excavated" temples. Asia Minor (?), III-I c. B.C. - 2. Inv. 83.AA.205. A royal "Physkon". Alexandria (?) III-I c. B.C. - 3. Inv. 83.AA.330. A late Ptolemy (IX or X?). Alexandria (?), 116-80 B.C.
bibl.seg: Smith R.R.R., Three Hellenistic Rulers at the Getty.
